title: Standard Meat Company Recalls Beef Products Due to Possible Salmonella Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, March 15, 2018 Standard Meat Company, a Saginaw, Texas establishment, is recalling up to 53,154 pounds of raw beef products that may be contaminated withSalmonella, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The raw beef products incorporated a...
